<line: 42> an answer to the complaint which is herewith served upon you,
<line: 43> days after service of this
<line: 44>  summons upon you, exclusive of the day of service. If you fail to do so, judgment by default will be taken against you for
<line: 45> the relief demanded in the complaint. You must also file your answer with the Clerk of this Court within a reasonable
<line: 46> period of time after service.

<line: 18> I, Marcel Gascon, being first duly sworn on oath, depose and say the following:

[TEXT]
<line: 20> I am over the age of 18, not a party to this action, and an employee of Elite Process Serving and Investigations..
<line: 21> Inc., a licensed private detective agency, license number 117-001 199.

[TEXT]
<line: 23> Type of Process: Summons in a Civil Case and Complaint

[TEXT]
<line: 25> Defendant to be served: Cavalry Portfolio Services, LLC, c/o CT Corporation System.

[TEXT]
<line: 27> Address where served: 208 South LaSalle Street, Suite 814, Chicago, IL60604

[TEXT]
<line: 29> On June 14, 2016 at 1:03 PM, I served the within named defendant in the following manner:.

[TEXT]
<line: 31> CORPORATE SERVICE: By leaving a copy of this process with Derrick Hackett, (Title) Intake Specialist,.
<line: 32> a person authorized to accept service and informed the person of the contents thereof.

[TEXT]
<line: 34> Description of person process was left with:

[TEXT]
<line: 36> Sex: Male - Race: Black - Hair: Black - Approx. Age: 24 - Height: Sitting - Weight: 160

[TEXT]
<line: 38> Under penalties as provided by law pursuant to Section 1-109 of the Code of Civil Procedure, the undersigned.
<line: 39> certifies that the statements set forth in this instrument are true and correct, except as to matters therein stated to
<line: 40> be on information and belief and as to such matters the undersigned certifies as aforesaid that he/she verily
<line: 41>  believes the same to be true.
